title: The Spiders - Episode 1: The Golden Sea

sources.title: Road To Race Day | A Crackle Original Series (Episode 1)
sources.description:
Watch the full series on for free on Crackle https://www.crackle.com/watch/6804
Full-length. No signup. No Subscription.

For the first time in history, the most exclusive and successful NASCAR motor club, Hendrick Motorsports, has given cameras full access to their team, including mega stars Dale Earnhardt Jr. and Jimmie Johnson. Along with chronicling one of their drivers as they prepare for a race, each episode will highlight the young characters that make-up their pit crews.

metadata.Plot: Kay Hoog finds a message that indicates that some Incas are still alive, but the secret organisation "Die Spinnen" wants the Incas' gold....
